subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s men’s basketball team will be led by the N.B.A. players Nene, Leandro Barbosa, Tiago Splitter and Anderson Varejao when it returns to the Olympics for the first time in 16 years.
snippet: Brazil’s men’s basketball team will be led by the N.B.A. players Nene, Leandro Barbosa, Tiago Splitter and Anderson Varejao when it returns to the Olympics for the first time in 16 years.
